net.derquinse.common.jaxrs.gson
Class GenericGsonProvider<T>

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.jaxrs.gson.GenericGsonProvider<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageBodyReader<T>, MessageBodyWriter<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteStringProvider, GsonProvider
public abstract class GenericGsonProvider<T>
extends Object
implements MessageBodyReader<T>, MessageBodyWriter<T>

Base class from Gson-based JSON JAX-RS providers.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.
